attributes.action: The Government want to have a General Election but have been stopped
attributes.background:
The Government haven’t been able to enable the FPTP act because they are unable to get a two thirds majority.
The danger we now face is a zombie government unable to pass legislation.
We also need a Brexit conclusion.
Please vote for an election ASAP.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/264215
